org.gbif.common.search.util

Class QueryUtils

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Utility class for common query methods.

                                                                    Integer limit)
        Builds SolrQuery suitable to the TermsComponent.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - solr field to be searched
        limit - maximum number of results
        Returns:
        a SolrQuery

                                                                    String fieldName,
                                                                    Integer limit)
        Builds SolrQuery suitable to the TermsComponent.
        Parameters:

        fieldName - solr field to be searched
        limit - maximum number of results
        Returns:
        a SolrQuery

        public static String clearConsecutiveBlanks(String query)

      • emptyToDefaultQuery

        public static String emptyToDefaultQuery(String q)
        If the query parameter is empty returns the default query "*".
        Returns:
        default query if q parameter is empty

      • getExactMatchField

        public static String getExactMatchField(FullTextSearchField field)
        Utility method that return the exact matching field to use. If field.exactMatchField is null or empty, return field.field() else return field.exactMatchField().

      • getMatchPatternAndScore

        public static String getMatchPatternAndScore(FullTextSearchField field,
                                             String query)
        According to the FullTextSearchField.partialMatching() returns a search pattern that could contains wildcards.
        Parameters:
        field - the Annotation to be analyzed
        query - the input search pattern

      • isNegated

        public static boolean isNegated(String value)
        Determines if the value is negated with the SearchConstants#NOT_OP operator.

      • isRangeQuery

        public static boolean isRangeQuery(String value)
        Checks if the value parameters is a Range query.

      • parseQueryValue

        public static String parseQueryValue(String q)
        Escapes a query value and transform it into a phrase query if necessary.

      • escapeQuery

        public static String escapeQuery(String value)
        Escape special characters and Solr reserved words.

      • removeNegation

        public static String removeNegation(String value)
        If the value parameter starts with SearchConstants#NOT_OP it is removed.

      • setQueryPaging

        public static void setQueryPaging(org.gbif.api.model.common.paging.Pageable pageable,
                                  org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery solrQuery)
        Helper method that sets the parameters for a paginated query.
        Parameters:
        pageable - the Pageable used to extract the parameters
        solrQuery - this object is modified adding the pagination parameters

      • setQueryPaging

        Helper method that sets the parameters for a paginated query.
        Parameters:
        pageable - the Pageable used to extract the parameters
        solrQuery - this object is modified adding the pagination parameters
        maxPageSize - the maximum page size allowed

      • toBoostedQuery

        public static String toBoostedQuery(String query,
                                    Integer boostValue,
                                    boolean withParentheses)
        Produces a query with the form: "(query)^boostValue".
        Parameters:
        query - to be boosted
        boostValue - Solr boost factor
        Returns:
        a query in format "(query)^boostValue."
